action.program_description: A calendar application displaying the week of November 11-17, 2024, with events scheduled.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows a calendar application open on a desktop. The calendar is open to the week of November 11-17, 2024.  The current date is Saturday, November 16th. An event titled "Important Meeting with Boss" is scheduled for Sunday, November 17th, from 4 PM to 5 PM. Another event, "Client Meeting: Fujitsu", also titled "Important Meeting with Boss", is scheduled for the same day. A pop-up window displays details about the "Important Meeting with Boss" event, with options to "Edit Event" or "Delete Event".
action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the "Important Meeting with Boss" event on Sunday, November 17th.
